== LinSpots ==
Linspots are volunteering services offered by the Open source enthusiasts.

== What must I know inorder to start a LinSpot? ==
* Basic operations of Linux.(like installing and configuring Linux to ones needs, usage of command base interface, able to, install or compile Linux aps from their repos or source)
* Desire to share and reproduce knowledge.

== Where to start a LinSpot? ==
Simple, anywhere close to public places, Internet cafes, in schools and collages or right in your home or office at your free time.

== Who to help? ==
People who are willing but don't know how to switch from commercial to opensource.

== What are LinSpot's Objectives? ==
* Help people migrate from commercial world to open source world.
* Help people to know where to get the resources like how to get Linux or linux support.
* Encouraging more and more people to use better software.
* Cultivating and motivating geeks in knowing programming languages to contribute further into Linux.
* Being a reinforcing center for nearby schools, collages and various institutions.
* Reproducing Ubuntu Cds or any free distro of GNU/Linux to spread Open Source Software.

==== If you think you have got free or think you can contribute any time to this project add yourself to LinSpot. ====
